content: पौर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पुरे वसति शैषिके अण्] {@--1@} Relating to a city or town, produced in a town, civic. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Filling one's own belly. --रः {@--1@} A townsman, citizen; (<ab>opp.</ab> जानपद); <ls>Ku. 6. 41</ls>; <ls>Me. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 10</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">74</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 3</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 9.</ls> {@--2@} A term applied to a prince engaged in war under particular circumstances. {@--3@} A planet in a state of opposition to other planets. --री The language of the servants in a palace. --रं A sort of grass (रोहिष).
